name: Flask-Dance with Multiple OAuth Providers
description: Testing Flask-Dance's OAuth integration with multiple OAuth providers using SQLAlchemy

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by GitHub

GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by GitHub

GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by Google

GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by Google
